title: RAK12023 WisBlock Soil Moisture Sensor Connector Module > RAK12023 WisBlock Soil Moisture Sensor Connector Module > Product Description > RAK12023 Soil Moisture Connector Module Overview
content: RAK12023 is a soil moisture connector module. It has one (1) standard WisBlock IO connector, which you can connect with the WisBlock Base. It also has three (3) connectors dedicated to the RAK12035. RAK12035 is a separate soil moisture sensor probe that can be connected to the RAK12023 module. Only one RAK12035 soil moisture sensor probes can be connected to the RAK12023 connector module.
parent_content: RAK12023 is a soil moisture connector module. It has one (1) standard WisBlock IO connector, which you can connect with the WisBlock Base. It also has three (3) connectors dedicated to the RAK12035. RAK12035 is a separate soil moisture sensor probe that can be connected to the RAK12023 module. Only one RAK12035 soil moisture sensor probes can be connected to the RAK12023 connector module.

title: RAK12023 WisBlock Soil Moisture Sensor Connector Module > RAK12023 WisBlock Soil Moisture Sensor Connector Module > Prerequisites > Connecting RAK12023 with RAK12035 and WisBlock Base
content:
To use a **RAK12023**, you need to connect at least one **RAK12035** Soil Moisture Sensor and a **WisBlock Base** to plug the module in. **WisBlock Base** provides power supply to the **RAK12023** and **RAK12035**. Furthermore, you need a **WisBlock Core** module to use the connector.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the screws to ensure a proper function.
parent_content:
To use a **RAK12023**, you need to connect at least one **RAK12035** Soil Moisture Sensor and a **WisBlock Base** to plug the module in. **WisBlock Base** provides power supply to the **RAK12023** and **RAK12035**. Furthermore, you need a **WisBlock Core** module to use the connector.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the screws to ensure a proper function.
